special_abilities.name: Keen Smell.
descriptions: The leucrotta has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.

special_abilities.name: Kicking Retreat.
descriptions: If the leucrotta attacks with its hooves, it can take the Disengage action as a bonus action.

special_abilities.name: Mimicry.
descriptions: The leucrotta can mimic animal sounds and humanoid voices. A creature that hears the sounds can tell they are imitations with a successful DC 14 Wisdom (Insight) check.

special_abilities.name: Rampage.
descriptions: When the leucrotta reduces a creature to 0 hit points with a melee attack on its turn, it can take a bonus action to move up to half its speed and make an attack with its hooves.

actions.name: Multiattack.
descriptions: The leucrotta makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its hooves.

actions.name: Bite.
descriptions: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 8 (1d8+4) piercing damage. If the leucrotta scores a critical hit, it rolls the damage dice three times, instead of twice.

actions.name: Hooves.
descriptions: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 11 (2d6+4) bludgeoning damage.
